1: <pb/><e>A ton bit eb yinatil Coré ti'</e> <pb/><t>Ach co Diosal, max jab wal on, yujtol a eb jichmam max alon ayon tzet max on yetok eb yet payxa.</t>
2: <t>Yetok epalil max oktej el eb conoblak, max a c'ayoncan el eb mimek conoblak tu', axa eb jichmam on max a cajbaj cayti'.</t>
3: <t>Manak yipalil eb, tamwal is yespada eb, max yak'balnej yuj yion eb jun tx'otx' ti'. Maj yi' eb jun tx'otx' ti' yin ak'oj owal. Palta a epalil max ak'on ayc'ay owal tu', yujtol ayach ec' yetok a mayk'ak'al, yuj a camc'ulal yin eb jichmam on.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, in Reyalil ach. Oj xan chi uj yuj a conob.</t>
5: <t>Ach ton chach oc jetok, xan chi ayc'ay eb ajc'ul juj. Yuj epalil xan max ayc'ay eb max yak' yowal jin on.</t>
6: <t>Tokwal a in julbal ti' ok waoc yipok in c'ul, tokwal yuj wespada ti' ok wak' ayc'ay owal.</t>
7: <t>Oj ton wali xan max ayc'ay eb ajc'ul juj. Ach max ak' ayc'ay eb chi chichon oc c'ul jin on.</t>
8: <t>Asan en ok jak'c'al tzaloj co c'ul, asan ach ok ach co bitnejc'al.</t>
9: <pb/><t>Palta max on entaknej el Mamin, max on acan oc yalan q'uixawc'ulal. Tok chito yal a c'ul chach eltok yetok eb co soldado on.</t>
10: <t>Ach max on a bekcanok, xan chon elcan aj bay eb ajc'ul. A eb chi chichon oc c'ul jin on, max yitok eb co tzet yetal.</t>
11: <t>Max on acan oc yul k'ab eb. Axca tol calnel on, chon ilaytok bay cambal. Max con a saklemnejcantok xol eb conoblak.</t>
12: <t>Max on a txoncan el ayon a conob on ti' yin yetzan. Tokwal ay tzet yetal max e' yuj on a txonon elok.</t>
13: <t>Max on acan oc yin buchbejalil. A eb nacionlak ay co cawilal chon tx'emoni, cax c'am jelapnok yul sat eb.</t>
14: <t>Max on acan oc yin buchbejal bay eb conoblak. A yet chon yilon eb, chi yucon eb jolom yin buchwalil.</t>
15: <t>C'am junok txolan tol watx' jet. Mul yail eb ajc'ul, xan chon ayxac'al nojan yuj q'uixawc'ulalil.</t>
16: <t>Chi pak ba eb jin. Chon is tx'emon eb, c'am jelapnok bay eb.</t>
17: <pb/><t>Tix ton tzet chon on ti'. Chi tit jun ti' jiban on, man yujok tol max ach tojcan c'ayc'ulal juj. Ilab tol yikem onc'al yin a trato ayon.</t>
18: <t>C'am chi co na' a tojcan c'ayc'ulal juj, ma ach co bekon canok. Tok ay a be chi co bekcanok.</t>
19: <t>Caxc'al axca tu' ach chon acan oc yalan majilal, max on a makchej ay xol k'ekk'inal tol ay is may.</t>
20: <t>Ach co Diosal, tatol max ach tojcan c'ayc'ulal juj, axa bay comon dios max jiay co ba a q'uexelok,</t>
21: <t>xam wal on eltek, tok ay ewanc'uan tol man ojtakok.</t>
22: <t>Palta xin, oj wali xan junjun txolan ijan chon yak' cam eb, axca calnel chi ilaytok yet chi cami, caytu' chon yut eb.</t>
23: <pb/><t>Mamin, ¿tzet wal yuj xan axca tol chach wayi? Ilontek xin, c'am chon entaknej el yin junelnej.</t>
24: <t>¿Tzet wal yuj xan chebaj el a ba ayon? ¿Tzet wal yuj xan chon tojcan c'ayc'ulal oj xol co miman yailal?</t>
25: <t>Mayal el jip, c'amxa tzet chi jala', tol ipan co jutxontok co ba sat tx'otx'.</t>
26: <t>¡Ajan wan xin, sebach. Colon el yuj a miman camc'ulal, cax chon bekchaj elok!</t>
